title: Fix chatbot display, add email to header, update service distance to California-wide

requirements.summary: Fix the chatbot answer display issue so that bot responses open and display properly when users interact with the chatbot component
acceptanceCriteria: Bot responses appear correctly when user sends messages
Message panel displays all chatbot answers without layout issues
Chatbot conversation flow works smoothly without display errors

file_operations.description: Fix the chatbot message display rendering to ensure bot responses are properly shown in the message panel. Review the message rendering logic, scroll behavior, and any conditional rendering that may prevent bot messages from displaying. Ensure the message list correctly renders both user and bot messages with appropriate styling and layout.

Review and fix the message state management to ensure bot responses are correctly added to the messages array and trigger re-renders. Verify that the sendMessage function properly adds both user messages and corresponding bot responses to the state without timing or state update issues.

requirements.summary: Add the email address 'queries@ethostowing.com' displayed prominently under the phone number '559-944-8178' in the Header component at the top of the website
acceptanceCriteria: Email address 'queries@ethostowing.com' is visible in the Header component
Email is positioned directly under or adjacent to the phone number
Email styling is consistent with the header design and maintains white text color

file_operations.description: Add the email address 'queries@ethostowing.com' to the Header component positioned under or adjacent to the existing phone number '559-944-8178'. Ensure the email is styled consistently with white text color to match the header design. Implement the email as a mailto: link for user convenience while maintaining the header's existing layout structure and backdrop blur effects.

requirements.summary: Update all references to long haul distance service from 'up to 400 miles' to 'entire California state' throughout the website, including Services component, ServiceArea component, and any other locations where this distance is mentioned
acceptanceCriteria: All instances of '400 miles' or 'up to 400 miles' are replaced with 'entire California state'
Services section reflects California-wide coverage for long distance towing
ServiceArea component description updated to reflect California state coverage
No remaining references to 400-mile limit exist in the application

file_operations.description: Update the long-distance towing service description to replace any reference to '400 miles' or 'up to 400 miles' with 'entire California state'. Review the service card content for long-distance/long haul towing and ensure the updated coverage area is accurately reflected in the description text.

Update the service coverage description to replace references to '400 miles' or '200-400 mile radius' with 'entire California state' for long haul services. Ensure the primary coverage area for Fresno/Central Valley remains intact while updating the extended coverage description to reflect California-wide service availability.
